solution_line_template: His dog gets {carrots_per_day} carrot a day and there are {days_per_year} days in a year, so his dog eats {carrots_per_day}*{days_per_year} = <<{carrots_per_day}*{days_per_year}={total_carrots}>>{total_carrots} carrots
There are {carrots_per_bag} carrots per bag and he will need {total_carrots} carrots, so that's {total_carrots}/{carrots_per_bag} = {total_bags} bags of carrots
The bags cost ${bag_cost} and he will need {total_bags} bags so that's ${bag_cost}*{total_bags} = $<<{bag_cost}*{total_bags}={total_cost}>>{total_cost} worth of organic carrots
